channel.title: What's New in 2.0 ✨ on Blowfish
channel.description: Recent content in What's New in 2.0 ✨ on Blowfish

item.title: Upgrading from Congo 1.x
item.description: Although Congo 2.0 contains a large number of changes, the theme has been designed to minimise the effort required to upgrade to the latest release. That said, there are some changes that require adjustments to existing sites that are built with Congo version 1.
